root.name: Eiyuu Densetsu: Sen no Kiseki
root.description: OverviewEiyuu Densetsu: Sen no Kiseki (The Legend of Heroes: Trails in the Flash) is an action RPG in Falcom's long running Legend of Heroes franchise developed for the PlayStation 3 and Vita. It is part of the Trails in the Sky sub-story, and the first game in the series originally developed for HD consoles. The game is due out in Japan in 2013.
